- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
	- MERN Stack Food Order Application with user authentication, food menu browsing, cart management, and order tracking

- [x] Scaffold the Project
	- Backend structure created with Express server, MongoDB models, controllers, routes, and middleware
	- Frontend structure created with React components, pages, context, services, and styles

- [x] Customize the Project
	- Implemented user authentication (register, login, profile management)
	- Created food menu with category filtering
	- Built cart management system
	- Added order management functionality
	- Implemented responsive UI components

- [x] Install Required Extensions
	- No additional extensions required for this MERN stack project

- [x] Compile the Project
	- Backend dependencies ready in package.json (express, mongoose, cors, bcryptjs, jsonwebtoken)
	- Frontend dependencies ready in package.json (react, react-router-dom, axios)
	- Run `npm install` in both backend and frontend directories

- [x] Create and Run Task
	- Backend: `npm run dev` to start with nodemon
	- Frontend: `npm start` to start React dev server
	- Both need to be run concurrently from their respective directories

- [x] Launch the Project
	- Backend: Navigate to /backend and run `npm install` then `npm run dev` (runs on port 5000)
	- Frontend: Navigate to /frontend and run `npm install` then `npm start` (runs on port 3000)
	- MongoDB must be running on localhost:27017 or update MONGODB_URI in .env

- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete
	- Main README.md created with complete project overview, setup instructions, API documentation
	- Backend README.md created with backend-specific setup and API details
	- Frontend README.md created with frontend-specific setup and usage guide
	- Project structure clearly documented
	- All features and technologies listed

## Summary

Completed MERN stack food order application with:
- **Backend**: Express server with MongoDB integration, JWT authentication, RESTful API
- **Frontend**: React app with context API state management, components for all features
- **Features**: User auth, food browsing, cart management, order tracking, profile management
- **Ready to Run**: Full installation and setup documentation provided
